incident: Wipe pad overflow left residue on nozzle and first layer smeared
notes: Wiper pad saturated; purge routine not updated after new filament.

incident: Filament runout alarm triggered with full spool
notes: Runout sensor window dusty; triggered during 3h print.

incident: Z homing failed with "probing timeout" and gantry racked
notes: Left Z lead screw dry and coupler loose causing skew.
